title: Photography
text:
Analog photography
In my spare time I like to take photos with one of the old cameras. I quite enjoy the lomography style of taking photos (Lomography is a photographic style which involves taking spontaneous photographs with minimal attention to technical details; source wiki). I also like to experiment with shooting photos.
I decided to post the photos on my website to make myself choose the shots I like best and keep them for my records.

Shot in Boston, July 2023 with Praktica BX20 on Kodak Color Plus, ISO 200 (pushed +1).

title: Kasia Kedzierska
text:
Education
PhD, Genomic Medicine and Statistics | University of Oxford | Oxford, UK | 2018 - 2024
MSc Eng, Biotechnology | Warsaw University of Technology | Warsaw, Poland | 2015 - 2018

About my name
Actually, my full name is Katarzyna Kedzierska, or Katarzyna Zofia Kedzierska (including my middle name). In Polish, we usually have a shorter version of a name that we go by and reserve the full legal name (here: Katarzyna) for official occasions, or when we get in trouble with our parents. Here you can find recordings on how to pronounce my shorter name: Kasia or longer: Katarzyna.

title: Kasia Kedzierska
text:
Experience
DeepLife | Deep Learning Researcher | Paris, France (Remote)
Microsoft Research New England | Intern | Cambridge, Massachusetts, USA
Novo Nordisk Research Centre Oxford | Intern | Oxford, United Kingdom
University of Virginia | Visiting Graduate Student @ Ratan group | Charlottesville, Virginia, USA

title: Kasia Kedzierska
text:
Hello! ðŸ‘‹
My name is Kasia Kedzierska^. My research interest lies at the intersection of Machine Learning and Biology & Healthcare. The rapid advancements in technology, especially those enabling investigating genomics at single cell resolution, coupled with the progress in Machine Learning, have rendered computational biology an exceptionally captivating and invigorating field of study. Within this space, Iâ€™m particularly interested in Multimodal and Generative Models.
If you find anything on this website interesting or just fancy a chat about the intersection of biology, healthcare and Machine Learning be sure to reach out!
